product_name: IT CosmeticsHello Results Wrinkle-Reducing Daily Retinol Serum-in-Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackSay hello to younger-looking skin! IT Cosmetics Hello Results Wrinkle-Reducing Daily Retinol Serum-in-Cream combines the power of an anti-aging serum with the soothing care of a cream in just one step.
details: DetailsFeaturesFeaturing dual retinol - a blend of free and encapsulated retinol, the formula starts to reach at least 15 layers into skin's surface in just 1 hour!* Plus, it includes tone-evening niacinamide.You'll see dramatic clinical results on more than just wrinkles! See an improvement in skin firmness and a reduction in fine lines, dark spots and hyperpigmentation.Developed with IT Cosmetics' board of plastic surgeons and dermatologists to balance efficacy with care, it's suitable for daily use from day 1, even on sensitive skin.Infused with vitamins B5 and E, this quick-absorbing retinol serum-in-cream soothes and hydrates skin, balancing common effects of retinol usage such as redness, dryness and flaking.Easily integrate it into your skincare routine for daily wrinkle reduction!*Demonstrated efficacy at 12 weeksHello Results products are:Co-developed with their board of dermatologists & plastic surgeonsClinically tested efficacy balanced with built-in careFor daily use from day 1Suitable for all skin types, even sensitiveBenefitsFormulated with dual-retinol blend of free and encapsulated retinol that starts to reach at least 15 layers into skin's surface in just 1 hour! Plus, tone-evening niacinamide.Infused with caring vitamins E and B5, and soothes and hydrates skin, balancing common effects of retinol usage such as redness, dryness and flaking.Clinical results for improvement in loss of firmness and the look of fine lines, wrinkles and dark spots.Suitable for daily use from day one, for all skin types, even sensitive.Item 2571942How To UsePress down to dispense pea-sized amount.Smooth onto skin starting with the forehead, then outer sides of face, chin and neck.Lastly, apply along T-zone and around orbital bone.Use once daily, morning or night.Always use in conjunction with SPF for sun protection.Hello Results has been formulated to replace your moisturizer; however should your skin require additional hydration, you can layer another moisturizer on top. Try IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ for sun protection, and Confidence In A Cream Anti-Aging Moisturizer for day or Confidence in Your Beauty Sleep Night Cream at night for multi-benefit hydration.Caution: Do not apply onto eyelids or lips. Avoid eye contact; if occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Use with sunscreen and avoid direct sun exposure. Do not use on irritated or broken skin or with other retinol products. If redness or irritation occurs, reduce frequency as tolerated.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Isononyl Isononanoate, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Polyacrylate, Glycine Soja Oil/Soybean Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Parfum/Fragrance, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Caprylyl Glycol, Allyl Methacrylates Crosspolymer, Benzyl Salicylate, Retinol, Chlorphenesin, Acrylates/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Copolymer, Benzyl Alcohol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polysorbate 20, Ceramide Np, Tocopherol, Hydroxypalmitoyl Sphinganine, Bht, Propyl Gallate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Press down to dispense pea-sized amount.Smooth onto skin starting with the forehead, then outer sides of face, chin and neck.Lastly, apply along T-zone and around orbital bone.Use once daily, morning or night.Always use in conjunction with SPF for sun protection.Hello Results has been formulated to replace your moisturizer; however should your skin require additional hydration, you can layer another moisturizer on top. Try IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ for sun protection, and Confidence In A Cream Anti-Aging Moisturizer for day or Confidence in Your Beauty Sleep Night Cream at night for multi-benefit hydration.Caution: Do not apply onto eyelids or lips. Avoid eye contact; if occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Use with sunscreen and avoid direct sun exposure. Do not use on irritated or broken skin or with other retinol products. If redness or irritation occurs, reduce frequency as tolerated.

reviews.headline: Nice product!
reviews.comments: Absorbs quickly into the skin.  Not greasy.  Effective against fine lines. I will buy it again.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: I love this product I have been using this for a while

reviews.headline: easy to use, smells bad
reviews.comments: I really wish this was fragrance free. it smells like old ladies. I get it. I'm old. I don't need to smell like it though. otherwise it works great and I'll use it until it's gone, but I probably won't buy it again.

reviews.headline: The best hydration cream
reviews.comments: Makes your face smooth like a baby.

reviews.headline: holy grail
reviews.comments: I love to try new products bit this is one I am committed to use! I've been using it for several years now and have probably used 6 jars of it. My skin continues to improve and my recent newcdrivers license picture clearly shows how much younger I look now than 4 years ago and I don't get any "work" done!  The dispenser is ingenious and doesn't waste product like so much packaging does. At first you must press several times to get it going; from thence on it dispenses the perfect amount.  Once it seems "empty", I pry it apart and find very little is left...maybe enough for one application, but clearly the packaging is designed so you get all the product with no effort and it cant be contaminated . I also use a Lancome serum every morning, and the two products seem to have made an amazing difference.

reviews.headline: Effective on sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Within a few days I saw fine lines going away withour peeling or burning like a stronger retinol. Plus my skin still felt moistureized. Also, I really love the pump so it does not ruin the efficacy of the rest of the product. 10/10

reviews.headline: Wonder Retinol
reviews.comments: I have purchased this product before and especially like the way it controls the amount needed on the top. It also is a fantastic retinol seum in cream! Goes on smoothy and feels good on the skin.

reviews.headline: Ok product, but the lid is awful
reviews.comments: I buy this It product when it is on sale,  as the product itself is OK.   HOWEVER, I wish they would change the pump lid....it works a few times and then stops.  You end up having to unscrew it just like a normal jar to get the moisturizer out.  It needs to stop wasting money on these lids and quit trying my patience.  A NORMAL Lid is preferred to one that quits working.

reviews.headline: Excellent
reviews.comments: I love this serum!! It feels really good on my face and i see a small difference in my wrinkles

reviews.headline: Just try it
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin and use this daily. I see the results within hours. My skin feels tighter. My pores are reduced. After a few days all the pores and blackheads on my nose almost gone. The fine lines on my forehead and undereyes have diminished.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Product is incredible. Results are almost immediate

reviews.headline: Very light product however not a retinol power house
reviews.comments: Hello Results did not offer much wrinkle or fine line reduction however it was a very nice moisturizer. I would only recommend this for a retinol beginner.

reviews.headline: A dream cream
reviews.comments: The best cream ever that i have used!!

reviews.headline: Caused acne
reviews.comments: I never break out but after using this product for a week I started getting cystic acne. I had to stop using it. It smells great though, absorbed quickly and made my skin feel very soft.

reviews.headline: So Efective!
reviews.comments: A little goes a long way. After using once a day for about a week, and realized, "Hey! My deep lines have melted away, and sl many pores just clean and clear as opposed to before using it.  I will never be without it if I can mange it. Great value, and smooth, clear, calm skin.

reviews.headline: Slow going but worth it
reviews.comments: It has taken a minute and definitely need to moisturize more but seeing smoother skin!!!

reviews.headline: Amazing Moisturizer and anti-aging serum in one!!
reviews.comments: love this moisturizer w/serum. So gentle, yet very effective.

reviews.headline: Eye cream
reviews.comments: Love it leaves my face feeling fresh

reviews.headline: Stay away from it
reviews.comments: Do not buy this, I start breaking out after a few days of using and I got a really bad rash. I already stop using it as soon as I got the rash, I thought breaking out was " normal". I'm not new with retinol,  and this has never happened to me before, I hope I can return the product.

reviews.headline: Good Bye Wrinkles
reviews.comments: This stuff is wonderful. I am 63 and has worked miracles on my wrinkles. This is only my second jar but wished I had know about it earlier. Love it

faceoff_positive.comments: I was very skeptical, as I am with most products that claim these types of results. However after using it diligently night and day, I have seen a decrease of the wrinkles. Also, the jar lasts longer than you think it would. I just ordered my 3rd.jar. It does work and I like the design of the jar top for accurate dispensing. This product has worked so well, I'm now using the cosmetic products also. Love them all.
faceoff_positive.headline: Performs as stated

faceoff_negative.comments: I use IT Cosmetics daily, and I am a fan of Confidence in a Cream, Bye-Bye under eye, and the CC Cream Foundation. I was excited about this new product, as I am always looking for something to lessen the look of lines on my skin. After three days of using this product regularly, I noticed that my skin was very dry. I stopped using it, and haven't used it for three days. However, my skin continued to be dry and get red. This morning, when I woke up, my entire face was peeling! This was supposed to be my first day back in the office, since we have been working from home because of Covid restrictions, but it looks like I can't go in today! I will not be using this product and hope I can return it for a refund!
faceoff_negative.headline: Poor Results for Me!
